Team Fortress para machos.

This game is not meant for the new players, as they will be isolated against the swarm of frag grenades and bunnyhoppers. However, if you get to play this over and over again, you will eventually learn new tricks and the things you can do will be amazingly fun, even if you're absolute garbage.
TFC is comprised of nine classes, all of whom have their own specific niche. Sure, the weapons aren't diverse like in its successor, but the skill required to use all of them effectively is high.
The graphics are as you would expect from old Valve games. They haven't aged well, and some of the different classes can look alike in combat.
The grenades offer a new way to practice your skill, as the mobility they offer outperforms TF2 in that regard. For example, the Scout's concussion grenades, though wavering the player's aim, can propel him far distances or launch him to immeasurable altitudes.
Despite the high skill cap and the veterans of the game which can be daunting, the game never really feels that way to me. Even by having over 200 ping connecting to servers, I still feel like I'm making an impact on the match and killing others seems satisfying.

If you can mind the grenades and the long-time players, and you believe you're good at learning new mechanics fairly quickly, I suggest you get this game. The only downside is a lack of players.

《军团要塞》（简称TFC）的出现预示着团队合作在《半条命》游戏中开始成为主流。《军团要塞》不过在原有的《半条命》游戏版本上增加了团队作战模式。在这种游戏模式下，玩家被分为彼此敌对的两组，在不同的地图上战斗以达成某一特定的目标，比如说夺取时方的旗帜、占领某片区域、暗杀或保护队伍-员等。在《军团要塞》中，玩家可以扮演战士，侦察兵，狙击手等9种职业。每个兵种都有自己的属性，他们在速度、装甲和武器上都截然不同，自然用处也就不同。当然，各个兵种都有自己的弱点和长处，这也是在《军团要塞》里个人英雄主义无法发挥作用的原因。

플레이 시간 : 0.5시간

평가 : 뭐야 이게

Um dos melhores FPS baseados na cooperação feitos pela Valve. Apesar da sua idade, ainda tem vários servidores ativos muito bons para se jogar. Com uma mecânica diferente para cada uma das diversas classes de personagens, fica difícil enjoar facilmente do jogo, tornando assim cada partida um verdadeiro desafio. Apesar do preço ser um tanto caro para um jogo que já foi lançado a muito tempo, vale a pena sua compra em alguma promoção. E para finalizar, o melhor de tudo: o jogo é extremamente leve, rodando em qualquer máquina atual e antiga. Já pode ligar aquela sua maquina a carvão e se preparar para a diversão.

I think most people who still play this play it just because of nostalgia. I hated it, all there was were random explosions, gunfire and people sprinting and jumping everywhere on tiny maps. I couldn't even distinguish who was on my team or not, what I had to do, what everyone else was even trying to do or even what team I was on, I was just confused as hell. It was a gigantic cluster-f_ck. What a f_cking mess.
And as for the community - from what I've seen of it, it's mostly just drugged up people with no jobs stuck in the '90s. If you want to play a retro-ish multiplayer first person shooter, you may as well just play Half-Life multiplayer.

Best game i've ever played.

In my humble opinion, the greatest online multiplayer game of all time. That being said, I'm not sure I'd recommend this. This game has a very small dedicated community of people that have been playing TFC ever since it released. It took me awhile to get even remotely competent being a younger player myself. This game is quite difficult to get into. Once you get past all of that though, what you're left with is truly one of the most fun and highly addictive games ever made. Amazing fast paced gameplay with dozens of unique and different styles of play.  Just don't come into it expecting it to be exactly like TF2. It's a different beast entirely.

Imagine TF2 but absolute chaos. Explosions, nails, machine gun fire, screams, with rocketjumpers and heavies running around, medics throwing AIDS and mustard gas at enemies, and the wildest Team Fortress thing: Balanced pyros.

If you want a dang good time, it's the best five bucks to spend.

[h1]Классическая классика[/h1]

Нужно быть слишком олдфажным, чтобы играть в нее в 2017 (уже почти в 2018 году). Я, к сожалению, не из таких, так что меня хватило не надолго. Однако, в игре еще полно персонажей, которые живут духом нулевых. И это хорошо.

I loved this game in its prime.  I recently went back to play it for old time sake.  While the trip down memory lane was nice for a few days I realized "you can't go home again" with some games.  This is one of them.  It took a while for me to relearn how to do things differently from TF2 (such as building sentry guns).  I forgot a lot of how to play this game so there was a slight learning curve.  The payoff was not enough to recommend the game in 2017.  The community is very small.  Only a handful of servers and only of few of them are actually full.  After a short time I discovered that TF2 is the better game by far.  There is a Charlie Pride song with the lyrics "It's nice to think about.  Maybe even visit.  But I wonder could I live there anymore."  I don't have to wonder any more.  The answer is no.  I am going back to TF2 for good and never coming back to the classic
even gayer than the sequel

É um remake do Team Fortress original feito desta vez sobre o motor do Half-Life, enquanto o primeiro utilizava Quake como base. Vinha como brinde para os jogadores que comprassem o título da Valve, mas fez tanto sucesso que começou a ser vendido separado também.

Os jogadores basicamente escolhem entre duas equipes iguais, que tentam defender sua base ao mesmo tempo em que precisam atacar a inimiga e roubar sua bandeira. O modo como cada jogador deve se comportar é diretamente influenciado pela classe que escolheu, e pela função que está exercendo na equipe, sendo, portanto, um jogo que requer trabalho de todos os jogadores em conjunto.

O jogo já é bem datado, mas, apesar disso, ainda é possível encontrar partidas com facilidade, muito embora os servidores estejam já repletos de jogadores veteranos, o que torna o ambiente muito difícil para aqueles que resolvam ingressar agora.

Desta forma, apesar de ser um jogo bom, não há motivos para alguém resolver jogá-lo agora, salvo se for por um fator nostalgia, ou se não tiver uma máquina que possa rodar títulos mais novos, vez que já existem jogos com a mesma proposta, que são bem mais intuitivos e bonitos graficamente, como o próprio Team Fortress 2, ou o Paladins, por exemplo, que, além de tudo, ainda são gratuitos.

Caso você tenha o jogo, ele é divertido e vale a pena instalar para recordar, mas certamente eu não o compraria de novo caso não tivesse, pois o seu tempo já passou, e agora é hora de aproveitar as coisas boas que temos atualmente. BOM (7/10).

[h1]Описание:[/h1]
Сетевой шутер от первого лица 1999 года выпуска являющийся модом для "Half Life" и первой частью легендарного "Team Fortress 2". Выбираем один из девяти классов, выбираем сервер и понеслась войнушка со стрельбой и взрывами. Классика.
В игре до сих пор присутствуют игроки. Вечером в субботу поймал около 80 человек на серверах. И если честно я познакомился с игрой как раз в 99 году, в компьютерном клубе. Никто из пацанов не играл в нее, все бегали в цс, халфу, а я как дурак запускал и бегал в одиночестве представляя как всех порву. Прошло много лет и вот я запустил игру... Эффект уже не тот, даже ностальгии никакой нет. Полчаса зевая побегал и выключил, омрачив приятные воспоминания.
Для 2017 года игра морально и графически слишком сильно устарела, чего нельзя сказать о некоторых других модах халфы. Благо, что разработчики уже давно выпустили вторую часть TF и если и запускать данную версию то только для сравнения или если у вас совсем древний комп, а без TF вы не можете жить. Знаю, что получу помидором в лицо, но не рекомендую! Оценку ставить не буду. Это классика и она не нуждается в оценках.

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в группу
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/uojer - тут вы сможете увидеть рекомендованные мною игры, другие обзоры, а также просто пообщаться в хорошей компании.

Team Fortress Classic

Team Fortress Classic is really good olf fps game, it is one of the best at the time it was released. It still is enjoyable to this day. Game is well put together, it is old but still enjoyable experience. You might encounter small bugs, but nothing too big to ruin the gaming experience. There is not that many players in this game anymore, but still enought to play games every now and then. Worth picking up at sale.

Grade: 8/10

If you buy this game not knowing anything but TF2 get ready for quite a few differences.  First off this game moves at a very fast pace.  There is no downtime on death.  Second, except a LOT of gernade spam.  If you don't die to a random gernade at least 5 times in a match you got lucky.  This game requires a lot of high level skills that are difficult to master... the people who play this regularly have had these skills for over a decade so don't get discouraged.  Play!  Its fun!
